name: Akari (Flugelus)
description:
Akari is a puzzle game where the objective is to fill each space on the stage with a blue fire, the player can select any square which will light up with a blue flame and the horizontal and vertical squares will also light up in the same way.

Plataform: Windows.

Genre: Puzzle.

Team size: Three members(Daniel Gonzales, Christian Hurtado, and me), students of SAE Institute Barcelona.

Project Lenght: 1 month.

Engine and tools: Unity, Google Docs, Github.

I programmed the gameplay logic, taking as a base an old game of the same name, we changed the essence of the game keeping the mechanics. I also programmed part of the logic of the main menu.
